name: The Pie King
description:
The Pie King is a Chill story platformer!

Wake up in a magical world filled with pies savoury and sweet, topped with a layer of delicate pastry. 

the Pie king has ordered you to traverse the world filled with ancient secrets, questing for ancient fruit. 

Discover an ancient evil that lurks deep within the world! 

What will you choose to do?

  • Meet over 15 different pies!
  • challenging and unique levels
  • savoury and sweet environments YUM!!
  • cute art style, digital painted sprites and environments
  • with multiple endings. which path will you choose?
  • Dialogue system, (yes you get to talk to the pies ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ )

This game was painted and coded by me! @HeliotropeArt

This is my first ever game project that I have ever made, I knew that I would create something relatively simple but I always knew it would be my pies 

(｡◕‿◕｡) 

I wanted to keep the vibes chill and make the game action-filled and fun!

You can find me on Instagram and YouTube :) I post art, pie and GULL content.
